Docs.param: The maximum number of TCP connections that may be opened to each Cosmos DB back-end.
Docs.summary: Configures the maximum number of TCP connections that may be opened to each Cosmos DB back-end. Together with MaxRequestsPerTcpConnection, this setting limits the number of requests that are simultaneously sent to a single Cosmos DB back-end (MaxRequestsPerTcpConnection x MaxTcpConnectionPerEndpoint).
